title: Plan Key Opinion Leader Engagement
description: A Medical Science Liaison (MSL) needs to identify and plan an engagement with a Key Opinion Leader (KOL) for a new drug launch.

tasks.description: Identify top KOLs in the field of cardiology based on publications and conference presentations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent queries a database and identifies Dr. Smith as a top-tier KOL.

tasks.description: Review Dr. Smith's recent research and past interactions with the company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that Dr. Smith has published on a relevant mechanism of action and had a positive interaction with the company 2 years ago.

tasks.description: Develop a scientific engagement plan with tailored discussion points for Dr. Smith.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a plan focusing on the new drug's novel mechanism of action.

tasks.description: Log the planned engagement in the CRM system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new activity record in the CRM for the planned meeting.
